title: Between Us
description: Developed a web application for couples enabling them to upload photos with short descriptions as a gallery, detail any date with an interactive calendar, exchange notes, and see how long they have been together with a day counter.
Employed MERN tech stack for development and Cloudinary for photo storage.

title: All-In-One Social Media
description: Made and deployed a React web app providing all-in-one social media management for restaurant and shop owners.
Integrated Facebook APIs to enable publishing, updating, deleting, viewing, and scheduling content on business accounts.
Leveraged Firebase for email-password authentication and data storage.

title: Restaurant Management
description: A semester long project in an OOP course where I led a team of 3 to build a simulated Restaurant System that allows managers, chefs, and customers to perform different kinds of real-life task such as hiring new staff and ordering food.
Integrated Facebook APIs to enable publishing, updating, deleting, viewing, and scheduling content on business accounts.
We also created an interactive UI with Java Swing library for better visualization and scalability
